system.description:
You may extinguish any flame within arm's reach by touching it, tell us what this looks like. Eating a fire instantly reloads your Fire. You may use this to @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.h7JpSHtXSQYIjsWA]{Overcome} attacks with the Burning tag as if you got a 10.

If you also have @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-pb-dragon.Item.8jIqhANfPVtb9se4]{Fire and Ice}, you may apply this move to that element too, instantly absorbing electricity, clearing ice, or removing poison from something you touch to Reload your Lightning, your Ice, or your Poison.
